featured.text: He is a famous fashion designer.

definition.zh_def: 設計師：負責創造和規劃產品、服裝、建築或其他藝術作品的人。
definition.en_def: A designer is a person who creates and plans products, clothing, buildings, or other artistic works.
definition.example: The designer presented her new clothing line at the fashion show.
